dialogue.introduction: You are my commander? I'm Nachi. I appreciate your contribution.
dialogue.library_intro: Born at the Kure Naval Yards. I am the second of the Myoukou Heavy Cruisers, who was the guardian of Shanghai. I was rushed out to the Pacific front as a flagship of the 5th fleet. Carrier-based planes? Ah, I'm a bit bad with those.
dialogue.secretary1: What? Do you have a plan?
dialogue.secretary3: Hmm? What's that you're doing? What kind of tactic is that?
dialogue.secretaryidle: No, I'm not bored. In fact i'm enjoying myself looking at what you're doing.
dialogue.secretarymarried: You, how are you doing? ...I see, it relieves me. We can sortie more together!
dialogue.wedding: Hey you… Somehow… I don’t hate you…. Yeah, as long as I am with you, I can promise more great victories. Definitely.
dialogue.equipment2: Hmm, where did you get the blueprints for this remodeling?
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Looks like I won't be appearing on the front lines for now, huh.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Apologies, but let me rest. Recess is part of a battle too.
dialogue.docking_complete: Looks like the repairs have been completed. Do you wish to check on it?
dialogue.ship_construction: Looks like a new ship has been launched. Looking forward to it.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The report for the battle results is in. Want to hear about it?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Let's go! Those who afraid just stay where you are!
dialogue.attack: Enemy to starboard! Take aim carefully!
dialogue.night_battle: We will avenge our friends! Pursue them!
dialogue.night_attack: One more time... This will be the critical hit!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: One more time... This will be the critical hit!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: One more time... This will be the critical hit!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: One more time... This will be the critical hit!
dialogue.mvp: I can't be getting all excited about this victory now.. we can't let our guard down yet. Nonetheless, tonight let's drink the night away!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: A wound like this... It's nothing...
dialogue.sunk: This is my end, huh... That's acceptable... Fare... thee... well...
dialogue.white_day_2015: You, what's this? A return gift, right? Well.... This is already enough for the garnishes. *Munch* *Munch* *Chew* *Chew* Sweet....
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: So it's been two years since we first met. Very well, let's drink tonight! Oh no, you're not going anywhere!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Summer, isn't it? It's hot, but nothing out of the ordinary. Well, why don't we open a bottle to rid of the heat!
dialogue.fall_2015: This season makes me feel a bit lonely for some reason. Doesn't sound like me, does it?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Christmas, eh... sounds decent. Tonight we'll be drinking till sunrise! That's right, doesn't sound that bad, isn't it?
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! This year too, I'll be cruising the sea together with you. Alright, first we have to liven things up!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Setsubun, huh? For today's occasion, we're having some sake. Ashigara, Admiral. Wanna join me?
